quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Actor
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, favorite. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: The following quote is from the movie Clockwork Orange.

options.text: ex: There was me, that is Alex, and my three droogs, that is Pete, Georgie, and Dim, and we sat in the Korova Milkbar trying to make up our rassoodocks what to do with the evening. The Korova milkbar sold milk-plus, milk plus vellocet or synthemesc or drencrom, which is what we were drinking. This would sharpen you up and make you ready for a bit of the old ultra-violence.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: This actor, who later went on to bigger and better roles, played DEA agent Deets in Point Break.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tom Sizemore

questions.question: In what 1939 movie do we hear this?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Wizard of Oz

questions.question: When the FBI raids the house in the movie Point Break, one suspect ends up shooting himself in the foot. The actor playing this character is better known as the lead singer of what famous group?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Red Hot Chili Peppers

questions.question: Which Batman movie does this quote come from?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Dark Knight

questions.question: This tag belongs to what 1973 movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Westworld

questions.question: This is part of a conversation held between which two characters in the 2008 movie Tropic Thunder?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Alpa Chino and Kirk Lazarus

questions.question: Fill in the missing words said by the Phantom in the movie The Phantom of the Opera:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: face; mirror

questions.question: In what movie can the following conversation be heard?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Da Vinci Code

questions.question: In the film Point Break, in preparation for a raid on the house of the suspected bank robbers, Gary Busey pretends he is looking for a lost dog. What name does he use for the dog?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Scooby

questions.question: This quote is from what 1978 cult favorite?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Animal House

questions.question: What 1975 movie is this conversation from?

options.text: ody: Then why dont we have one more drink and go down and cut that shark open?
ody: I can do anything; Im the chief of police.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jaws

questions.question: In the movie Point Break, FBI agent Utah was quarterback for a major college football team and ended up getting hurt in the Rose Bowl. What team did he play against in that bowl game?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: USC

questions.question: Special Agent Johnny Utah, played by Keanu Reeves in Point Break, is a former quarterback for what university?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ohio State

questions.question: This exchange was heard in what 2006 movie?

options.text: ug Carlin: But you can change the course of a river, right?
nny: Yeah, but that river is the Mississippi and were lobbing what amounts to a pebble into it. Thats a very few tiny ripples in a kind of big body of water, dont you think?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Deja Vu

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Point Break
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, projects. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Point Breakcharacter Bodhi often spoke of the 50-year storm, a climatic event that happens twice a century when a vicious current comes to the coast of Australia from where?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Antarctica

questions.question: Which of the following movies contained more than one set of siblings?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Long Riders

questions.question: Which one of the ex-presidents gets killed in the final bank robbery in Point Break?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lyndon B. Johnson

questions.question: In 1981 Jane starred in this movie with her father Henry Fonda.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: On Golden Pond

questions.question: What 1985 film can the following be heard in?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Breakfast Club

questions.question: What is one of the reasons for which the 2004 movie Crash did not receive the Oscar for the best movie of 2004?

options.text: It was beaten by Million Dollar Baby.
It was not nominated in that category at all.
It did not play for at least a week in Los Angeles.
It was beaten by the movie Ray.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It did not play for at least a week in Los Angeles.

questions.question: The Wilson brothers teamed up for this 2001 dramatic comedy with an ensemble cast including Ben Stiller and Anjelica Houston.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Royal Tenenbaums

questions.question: At the end of the movie Point Break, Bodhis buddy, Rosie, holds Lori Pettys character hostage. Bodhi describes eloquently Rosies ability to inflict pain by saying: Rosie, hes like a mechanism. Hes got this gift of ..........................
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: ...blankness.

questions.question: The 1933 movie Duck Soup, starring the Marx brothers, was really about duck soup.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In Point Break, during the final escape, Bodhi wants the pilot to fly to what Mexican town?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: San Felipe

questions.question: In the film Point Break, during a stake out, agent Pappas orders Utah to get some take out food. What does he want him to get?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Meatball sub

questions.question: This rapper turned actor starred in 2 films with his children, 2006s The Pursuit of Happyness and 2008s I Am Legend.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Will Smith

questions.question: This multi-talented family has churned out several projects over the years, most notably the movie Im Gonna Git You Sucka.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Wayans

questions.question: What star of Oceans Eleven, Oceans Twelve and Oceans Thirteen starred as detective Graham Waters in the 2004 movie Crash?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Don Cheadle

questions.question: What 1956 movie is this dialog from?

options.text: ristine Penmark: Rhoda, what happened to old Mrs. Post in Witchita?
ristine Penmark: Was that all, Rhoda?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Bad Seed

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Actor
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, line. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which Grammy Award-nominated actor and rapper played Anthony in the 2004 movie Crash?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ludacris

questions.question: Which one of these actors did not participate in the 2004 movie Crash?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Heath Ledger

questions.question: Which statement about the 2004 movie Crash is true?

options.text: This movie won three Oscars but not the Best Picture Oscar.
This movie was the closest second place vote-getter in the history of the Oscars.
This is the first movie set in Oakland to win the Best Picture Oscar.
The director was so dedicated to the movie that he used his own home as a set to stay in budget.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The director was so dedicated to the movie that he used his own home as a set to stay in budget.

questions.question: Although this actor never reached the fame of his ex-wife, he made a brilliant performance as the young policeman Tom Hansen in the 2004 movie Crash.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ryan Phillipe

questions.question: The idea for the 2004 movie Crash came to the director when his car was carjacked.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What actor won an Academy Award for his performance in The Godfather?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Marlon Brando as Vito Corleone

questions.question: What is the end line of Margaret Mitchels only novel and of the self-titled Academy Award-winning movie adaptation?

options.text: Frankly, my dear, I dont give a damn.
So, you see I shall have to marry you.
Ill go home. And Ill think of some way to get him back.
After all, tomorrow is another day.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: After all, tomorrow is another day.

questions.question: This actor won an Academy Award for portraying Atticus Finch, a character from Harper Lees only novel, who represents the ideal of a lawyer and father.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gregory Peck

questions.question: What star of The Pursuit of Happiness played Christine Thayer, the wife of Cameron Thayer in the 2004 movie Crash?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Thandie Newton

questions.question: Who directed the movie The Godfather?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Francis Ford Coppola

questions.question: Which actor from the TV series Lost had a role in the 2004 Crash?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Daniel Dae Kim

questions.question: Winston Grooms price for the screenplay rights to his 1986 novel included a share of the profits. However, Paramount and the film’s producers refused to pay him, and to add insult to injury, Grooms name was not mentioned in any of the six Oscar-winner speeches. Name the novel and the self-titled 1994 movie.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Forrest Gump

questions.question: What were the five major crime families of New York in The Godfather?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Corleone, Tattaglia, Barzini, Stracci, Cuneo

questions.question: Francis Ford Coppola won his only Academy Award for his work in the Godfather series.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: James Spader, Holy Hunter, and Rosanna Arquette starred in a 1996 movie called Crash.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Blade and Novel
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, sanaa, blade. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Who is the narrator of Ken Keseys novel One Flew Over the Cuckoos Nest, which was adapted into a multi-Oscar winning film?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chief Bromden

questions.question: Name the author of the novel The Silence of the Lambs which was adapted into a Big Five Academy Award-winning movie.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Thomas Harris

questions.question: This Academy Award-winning author and screenwriter is best known for his 1969 novel about the Mafia which he later co-adapted into a film directed by Francis Ford Coppola
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mario Puzo

questions.question: The highly successful movie Schindlers List, directed by Steven Spielberg, is based on this historical novel by Australian author Thomas Keneally.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Schindlers Ark

questions.question: What song, performed by Judy Garland in the 1939 movie The Wizard of Oz, won the Academy Award for Best Original Song?

options.text: If I Only Had A Heart

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Over the Rainbow

questions.question: Denzel Washington and LL Cool J were considered for the role of Blade in the movie trilogy of the same name.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Which of Peter Jacksons movies based on J. R. R. Tolkiens The Lord of the Rings won all the eleven Academy Awards for which it was nominated?

options.text: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (2003)

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (2003)

questions.question: Colin Farrell turned down the role of Hannibal King in Blade Trinity.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Why does Blade team up with the Bloodpack in Blade II?

options.text: To find a cure to turn him into a mortal

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: To help the Shadow Council

questions.question: Emma Thompson won an Academy Award for the Sense and Sensibility screenplay based on the novel of the same name by this famous English writer.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jane Austen

questions.question: Udo Kier, who played Vampire Elder Dragonetti in Blade, also starred in what 1974 horror movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Blood For Dracula

questions.question: Sanaa Lathan starred in all the three movies from the Blade trilogy.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In the Blade trilogy, Jessica Alba stars as Abigail Whistler.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What is the correct order of the premier years of the Blade movies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1998, 2002, 2004

questions.question: In Blade II, Blades enemies are the Daywalkers.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Crusade
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, people, space. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Where and when does the opening scene of The Last Crusade take place?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Utah, 1912

questions.question: What historical object was Indiana Jones father searching for his whole life?

options.text: A piece of the True Cross

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Holy Grail

questions.question: Guillermo del Toro directed both Blade II and Blade Trinity.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What statement is true about the sword duel between Drake and Blade in Blade Trinity?

options.text: It was originally left out of the movie.
Dominic Purcell (Drake) did all his stunts.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dominic Purcell (Drake) did all his stunts.

questions.question: The 1997 movie Titanic won how many Oscars?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 11

questions.question: What causes Indys scar above his chin in the movie The Last Crusade?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A Whip

questions.question: What event came last in the CGI blockbuster movie The Day After Tomorrow?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The blizzards

questions.question: What does the drunk say when entering the aliens’ spaceship at the end of the 1996 movie Independence Day?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Im Back!

questions.question: The cruise liner capsizes in the disaster classic The Poseidon Adventure.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What is the name of the artifact that Indiana Jones steals from the tomb raiders in the cave, loses it,  and then recovers it 26 years later off the Portuguese Coast?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Cross of Coronado

questions.question: All of the following actors starred in all the three Blade movies: Stephen Dorf, Traci Lords, Ron Perlman, Parker Posey, Kris Kristofferson.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What is the name of the revolutionary tornado research device made by Bill Paxton and Helen Hunts characters in the disaster flick Twister?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dorothy

questions.question: In the 1974 movie Earthquake, they lower people down from an office building by a chair attached to what material?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A fire hose

questions.question: What are the names of the two space shuttles sent to destroy the meteor that is spelling certain doom in the film Armageddon?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Freedom and the Independence

questions.question: Which character from the movie Steel Magnolias delivered this memorable line?

options.text: l gay men have track lightin. And all gay men are named Mark, Rick, or Steve.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Clariee

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Fletch and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, stanwyk, diary. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Fletch from the self-titled movie visits Dr. Joseph Dolan to find out if Alan Stanwyk really has cancer. What song does Fletch start singing in the doctors office?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Moon River

questions.question: Who portrays Alan Stanwyk in the movie Fletch?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tim Matheson

questions.question: In the movie Fletch, Fletch finds out that Gail Stanwyk is not Alans only wife. Who else is Alan married to?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sally Ann Cavanaugh

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT one of the traps that must be overcome in the movie The Last Crusade before getting to the Holy Grail?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Cup of God

questions.question: Indiana is the name of Indiana Jones pet cat.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In the film Fletch, Alan Stanwyk persuades Fletch to kill him by telling him that he is dying of cancer and wants to avoid a slow painful death. Fletch agrees to kill Alan for how much?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: $50,000

questions.question: Who is the beach drug dealers connection in the movie Fletch?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chief Jerry Karlin

questions.question: Where do Alan Stanwyks parents live in the comedy film Fletch?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Provo, Utah

questions.question: Who portrays Larry, Fletchs research assistant at the newspaper in the movie Fletch?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Geena Davis

questions.question: What is Indiana Jones real name as revealed in the movie The Last Crusade?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Henry Jones Jr.

questions.question: What does Adolf Hitler do to Dr. Jones Grail Diary in the movie The Last Crusade?

options.text: He never sees or touches it.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He autographs it.

questions.question: In the film Fletch, while trying to find out more about Alan Stanwyk, Fletch ends up in the morgue and passes out. He wakes up in the Records room and asks for what album?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Beatles - White Album

questions.question: In the 1985 movie Fletch, Fletch charges several meals to whose credit card?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mr. Underhills

questions.question: What is Fletchs favorite team in the movie Fletch?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: L.A. Lakers

questions.question: What is Fletchs middle name in the self-titled movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Maurice
